html:
Alternative forms[edit]

  • adcurrō

Etymology[edit]

From ad- +‎ currō (“run”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • (Classical) IPA(key): /akˈkur.roː/, [akˈkʊr.roː]
  • (Ecclesiastical) IPA(key): /akˈkur.ro/, [akˈkur.rɔ]

Verb[edit]

accurrō (present infinitive accurrere, perfect active accurrī or accucurrī, supine accursum); third conjugation

  1. I run or hasten (to help).
  2. I charge or rush (to attack).
